subject: Re: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Here is the website where I found the information.  There is much 
here, but what I found that the details about the 1960's research 
using mediums was listed under the Spiricom section, discussing the 
Spiricom Mark I, II, III, and IV.  I'm still searching and reading 
from this site as it is full of interesting data.

http://www.worlditc.org/

I even did a Blog Talk radio show about the 1960's group last year.
My BTR shows are located here, and it's one of the archived shows:

http://www.blogtalkradio.com/ufogeek

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@..." 
<Threadsintyme@...> wrote:
>
> Mike,
> WONDFERFUL that you know some mediums...hopefully they may even be 
able to help you.
> I was wondering Mike, are there ajny web sites that speak of this 
testing and research in the 1960's? 
> Al
> 
> -- "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
> 
> Al,
> 
> - The results as written, were very good. Actual conversations were 
> documented, and even help provided on ways to better contact and 
> interface with the spirits, given by the spirits themselves.
> 
> - I don't know about specs on the Ion Lamp. I just wanted to try it 
> since it is active light frequency that changes or is manipulated 
> very easily.
> 
> - I'll keep your ideas in mind when I do my next set.
> 
> - Thanks for the advice about finding mediums. I know a few and 
will 
> probably talk with them since I am already friends with each of 
them.
> 
> Mike
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@" 
> <Threadsintyme@> wrote:
> >
> > Mike,
> > What were the results of working the mediums? Anything 
significant? 
> > Kinda wish we both lived a bit closer, we might have been able to 
> work together on some projects... :D We live in Michigan. 
> > Al
> Mike, Is there any research that says that an ion lamp is hyper 
> sensitive? 
> 
> You might wish to hookup your EMF detectors in such a fashion that 
> each one showing a response would be video taped. If one has a 
> positive, then it might show up on your video.
> 
> Also, if you are interested in locating a medium, look in your 
local 
> phone book for a local spiritualist church. They will have many 
> mediums attending. Before you ask to test them, please, build up a 
> friendship first. I was recently asked to be tested by some locals 
> but their proposal was very poorly written and had no real tests or 
> conclusions, per se. I turned them down. 
> 
> Al
> > 
> > -- "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> > 
> > Funny you should mention using a medium to communicate with this 
> > system. That dediated group in the 1960's first used mediums in 
> > conjunction with their electronic equipment.
> > The mediums were used to relay the words or feelings they heard 
or 
> > felt from the spirits that were attracted to the different modes 
of 
> > frequencies that the experimentors.
> > 
> > I'm in Colorado Springs, Colorado; in the same neighborhood where 
> > Nikola Tesla did his experiments while in this city for about 6-8 
> > months. His lab was located about a 3 minute drive from my house.
> > 
> > - Mike
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@" 
> > <Threadsintyme@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Mike,
> > > I have an idea for you to think about and possibly consider 
> > trying. mediums, as you know are about a dime per dozen these 
days. 
> > Have you considered video taping a medium before, during and 
after 
> a 
> > reading was being done? 
> > > Once while some of our smaller group in Muskegon, MI were out 
> ghost 
> > hunting one afternoon, I sensed a spirit nearby and asked some of 
> the 
> > members to use their EMF equipment to see if they could pickup 
> > anything. One guy had a positive reaction to a spirit that was 
> > standing in front of me. His EMF detector showed a few blips and 
> then 
> > the spirit was gone. I was still communicating with the spirit 
> after 
> > the blimps stopped. Might be worth trying as an experiment.
> > > Mike, where are you located?
> > > Al
> > > 
> > > -- "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> > > 
> > > Hi Al,
> > > 
> > > To answer your first question I provide this link:
> > > http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3S-4e-wxd6U
> > > It's a video that better explains how I think it might work. 
> (Just 
> > a 
> > > couple of possibilites).
> > > 
> > > To answer your second question... I have done three 
> experimentation 
> > > sessions so far, and the results differ. In one I got no 
> response, 
> > > and in the other two I did get action but I'm unsure on what 
> caused 
> > > it. I'm reviewing it further.
> > > 
> > > My use of the Ion lamp, which is away from the 
traditional 'video-
> > > loop' method is based on things I've read from those who were 
> into 
> > > this EVP/ITC thing way before us. Back in the 1960's there was 
> much 
> > > experimentation going on that involved a varied range of 
> > frequencies, 
> > > including light frequencies. Even house plants were considered 
> into 
> > > the EVP/ITC equation (Maybe I'll try that next).
> > > 
> > > My use of the Ion lamp goes along with a continued desire to 
> > further 
> > > the work of the dedicated group from the 1960's... and continue 
> to 
> > > see if 'other' ideas work.
> > > 
> > > After all... sweeping radio signals, and snowy video pictures 
are 
> > > only a couple of snippets of the frequencies available for 
> > > experimentation. Even my limited idea of what the Ion lamp 
might 
> do 
> > > could be way off... but I have to try it. I might be surprised 
> what 
> > > it might be capable of. It might not only offer increased 
> intensity 
> > > and stimulation. Maybe it could even offer more than that.
> > > 
> > > I'll keep trying new things... and I'll make sure to share them 
> > with 
> > > the group.
> > > 
> > > Thanks for asking...
> > > 
> > > - Mike
> > > 
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "threadsintyme@" 
> > > <Threadsintyme@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > An interesting setup, Mike...
> > > > I do have a question though.,..what is the ion lamp for? 
> > > > Have you had any success photographing any spirits?
> > > > Al
> > > > 
> > > > -- "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > For those who care to see... I've posted a quick 4 minute 
video 
> > > tour of 
> > > > the EVP and ITC systems I use, with a quick explanation of 
> their 
> > > setup.
> > > > The video is at:
> > > > http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyQKmBXY1ig
> > > > 
> > > > Thanks...
> > > > and have a super-natural paranormal day!
> > > > - Mike Coletta
